mapper.sql: video_id as videoId,school_id as schoolId, title, teacher, content, cover, visits, is_free as isFree, price, act_price as actPrice
mapper.insert: insert into edu_video(school_id, title, teacher, content, cover, visits, is_free, price, act_price) values (#{schoolId}, #{title}, #{teacher}, #{content}, #{cover}, #{visits}, #{isFree}, #{price}, #{actPrice})
mapper.sql: item_id as itemId, video_id as videoId, title, video, duration, count, is_test as isTest
mapper.select:
select
from edu_video_item where 1=1
and video_id = #{videoId}
order by count
mapper.insert: insert into edu_video_item(video_id, title, video, duration, count, is_test) values (#{videoId}, #{title}, #{video}, #{duration}, #{count}, #{isTest})
insert into edu_my_video(video_id, user_id, date, items) values (#{videoId}, #{userId}, #{date}, #{items})
mapper.select: SELECT v.video_id videoId, v.title, v.teacher, v.content, v.visits, v.is_free isFree, v.cover, v.price, v.act_price actPrice from edu_my_video m LEFT JOIN edu_video v on m.video_id = v.video_id where m.user_id = #{userId}
